	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="http://fonlow.com/TestOpenApi/2024/04")]
	public class StartTalkResponse
	{
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Description of the action taken
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="message")]
		public string Message { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// The unique identifier for this call leg. The UUID is created when your call request is accepted by Vonage. You use the UUID in all requests for individual live calls
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="uuid")]
		public string Uuid { get; set; }
	}

	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="http://fonlow.com/TestOpenApi/2024/04")]
	public class UpdateCallRequestTransferAnswerUrl
	{
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Transfer the call to a new NCCO
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="action")]
		public RequestTransferActionParam Action { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="destination")]
		public UpdateCallRequestTransferAnswerUrlDestination Destination { get; set; }
	}
	
	public class UpdateCallRequestTransferAnswerUrlDestination
	{
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Always `ncco`
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="type")]
		public string Type { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// The URL that Vonage makes a request to. Must return an NCCO.
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="url")]
		public string[] Url { get; set; }
	}

	{
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Refer to the [NCCO Guide](https://developer.nexmo.com/voice/voice-api/ncco-reference) for a description of possible NCCO parameters.

	}

	/// <summary>
	/// <strong>DEPRECATED</strong> The voice & language to use
	/// </summary>
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="http://fonlow.com/TestOpenApi/2024/04")]
	public enum Voice_name
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		Aditi = 0,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		Agnieszka = 1,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		Alva = 2,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		Amy = 3,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		Astrid = 4,

	public partial class Misc
	{
		
		private System.Net.Http.HttpClient httpClient;
		
		private JsonSerializerOptions jsonSerializerSettings;
		
		public Misc(System.Net.Http.HttpClient httpClient, JsonSerializerOptions jsonSerializerSettings=null)
		{
			if (httpClient == null)
				throw new ArgumentNullException("Null HttpClient.", "httpClient");

			if (httpClient.BaseAddress == null)
				throw new ArgumentNullException("HttpClient has no BaseAddress", "httpClient");

			this.httpClient = httpClient;
			this.jsonSerializerSettings = jsonSerializerSettings;
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Get details of your calls
		/// Get details of your calls
		/// GetCalls 
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="status">Filter by call status</param>
		/// <param name="date_start">Return the records that occurred after this point in time</param>
		/// <param name="date_end">Return the records that occurred before this point in time</param>
		/// <param name="page_size">Return this amount of records in the response
		/// Minimum: 1
		/// Maximum: 100
		// </param>
		/// <param name="record_index">Return calls from this index in the response</param>
		/// <param name="order">Either ascending or  descending order.</param>
		/// <param name="conversation_uuid">Return all the records associated with a specific conversation.</param>
		/// <returns>OK</returns>
		public async Task<GetCallsResponse> GetCallsAsync(GetCallsStatus status, System.DateTimeOffset date_start, System.DateTimeOffset date_end, int page_size, int record_index, GetCallsOrder order, string conversation_uuid, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "?status=" + status+"&date_start=" + date_start.ToUniversalTime().ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffffffZ")+"&date_end=" + date_end.ToUniversalTime().ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffffffZ")+"&page_size="+page_size+"&record_index="+record_index+"&order=" + order+"&conversation_uuid=" + (conversation_uuid==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(conversation_uuid));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var contentString = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();
				return JsonSerializer.Deserialize<GetCallsResponse>(contentString, jsonSerializerSettings);
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Create an outbound call
		/// Create an outbound Call
		/// CreateCall 
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="requestBody">Call Details</param>
		public async Task CreateCallAsync(CreateCallRequestNcco requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			var contentJson = JsonSerializer.Serialize(requestBody, jsonSerializerSettings);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(contentJson, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Get detail of a specific call
		/// Get detail of a specific call
		/// GetCall {uuid}
		/// </summary>
		/// <returns>Ok</returns>
		public async Task<GetCallResponse> GetCallAsync(Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "{uuid}";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var contentString = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();
				return JsonSerializer.Deserialize<GetCallResponse>(contentString, jsonSerializerSettings);
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Modify an in progress call
		/// Modify an in progress call
		/// UpdateCall {uuid}
		/// </summary>
		public async Task UpdateCallAsync(UpdateCallRequestTransferNcco requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "{uuid}";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Put, requestUri))
			{
			var contentJson = JsonSerializer.Serialize(requestBody, jsonSerializerSettings);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(contentJson, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Play DTMF tones into a call
		/// Play DTMF tones into a call
		/// StartDTMF {uuid}/dtmf
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="requestBody">action to perform</param>
		/// <returns>Ok</returns>
		public async Task<DTMFResponse> StartDTMFAsync(DTMFRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "{uuid}/dtmf";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Put, requestUri))
			{
			var contentJson = JsonSerializer.Serialize(requestBody, jsonSerializerSettings);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(contentJson, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var contentString = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();
				return JsonSerializer.Deserialize<DTMFResponse>(contentString, jsonSerializerSettings);
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Stop playing an audio file into a call
		/// Stop playing an audio file into a call
		/// StopStream {uuid}/stream
		/// </summary>
		/// <returns>Ok</returns>
		public async Task<StopStreamResponse> StopStreamAsync(Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "{uuid}/stream";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Delete, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var contentString = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();
				return JsonSerializer.Deserialize<StopStreamResponse>(contentString, jsonSerializerSettings);
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Play an audio file into a call
		/// Play an audio file into a call
		/// StartStream {uuid}/stream
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="requestBody">action to perform</param>
		/// <returns>Ok</returns>
		public async Task<StartStreamResponse> StartStreamAsync(StartStreamRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "{uuid}/stream";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Put, requestUri))
			{
			var contentJson = JsonSerializer.Serialize(requestBody, jsonSerializerSettings);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(contentJson, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var contentString = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();
				return JsonSerializer.Deserialize<StartStreamResponse>(contentString, jsonSerializerSettings);
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Stop text to speech in a call
		/// Stop text to speech in a call
		/// StopTalk {uuid}/talk
		/// </summary>
		/// <returns>Ok</returns>
		public async Task<StopTalkResponse> StopTalkAsync(Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "{uuid}/talk";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Delete, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var contentString = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();
				return JsonSerializer.Deserialize<StopTalkResponse>(contentString, jsonSerializerSettings);
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Play text to speech into a call
		/// Play text to speech into a call
		/// StartTalk {uuid}/talk
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="requestBody">Action to perform</param>
		/// <returns>Ok</returns>
		public async Task<StartTalkResponse> StartTalkAsync(StartTalkRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "{uuid}/talk";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Put, requestUri))
			{
			var contentJson = JsonSerializer.Serialize(requestBody, jsonSerializerSettings);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(contentJson, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var contentString = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();
				return JsonSerializer.Deserialize<StartTalkResponse>(contentString, jsonSerializerSettings);
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
	}
	
	public enum GetCallsStatus
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		started = 0,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		ringing = 1,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		answered = 2,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		machine = 3,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		completed = 4,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		busy = 5,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		cancelled = 6,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		failed = 7,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		rejected = 8,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		timeout = 9,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		unanswered = 10,
	}
	
	public enum GetCallsOrder
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		asc = 0,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute()]
		desc = 1,
	}
}

namespace Fonlow.Net.Http
{
	using System.Net.Http;

	public class WebApiRequestException : HttpRequestException
	{
		public System.Net.HttpStatusCode StatusCode { get; private set; }

		public string Response { get; private set; }

		public System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpResponseHeaders Headers { get; private set; }

		public System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue ContentType { get; private set; }

		public WebApiRequestException(string message, System.Net.HttpStatusCode statusCode, string response, System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpResponseHeaders headers, System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue contentType) : base(message)
		{
			StatusCode = statusCode;
			Response = response;
			Headers = headers;
			ContentType = contentType;
		}
	}

	public static class ResponseMessageExtensions
	{
		public static void EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx(this HttpResponseMessage responseMessage)
		{
			if (!responseMessage.IsSuccessStatusCode)
			{
				var responseText = responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().Result;
				var contentType = responseMessage.Content.Headers.ContentType;
				throw new WebApiRequestException(responseMessage.ReasonPhrase, responseMessage.StatusCode, responseText, responseMessage.Headers, contentType);
			}
		}
	}
}
